name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Skilled in **Monitoring & Diagnostics systems**, **Power systems**, and **High-voltage equipment**, I am a Field Service Engineer with 10+ years of experience in **Control & Instrumentation**. I possess strong **problem-solving skills**, adept at addressing complex technical issues autonomously, and am customer-focused with excellent **communication skills** in English, Spanish, Portuguese, and Italian. My background includes hands-on expertise in the installation and maintenance of **Kelman DGA equipment**, with a proven track record of enhancing operational efficiency. I am experienced in delivering comprehensive training programs and diagnostics solutions that drive reliability and performance. I am passionate about using my technical knowledge and interpersonal skills to deliver impactful results in the field.
